mapper.select: SELECT r.res_code, r.host_code, h.comp_name, r.res_state, r.res_date,r.res_hour, r.res_review_chk FROM reservation_tbl r JOIN host_tbl h ON h.host_code = r.host_code WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation_tbl SET res_review_chk = 'Y' WHERE res_code = #{res_code}
mapper.select: select * from review_tbl where user_code = #{user_code} order by review_code desc
select r.*, u.user_name from review_tbl r, user_tbl u where r.user_code = u.user_code order by r.regDate DESC

select r.*,res.host_code,u.user_name from review_tbl r, reservation_tbl res, user_tbl u where r.res_code = res.res_code and res.user_id = u.user_id and res.host_code = #{host_code} order by r.regDate desc

select res.*, de.product_code, p.product_name from reservation_tbl res, user_tbl u, reservation_detail_tbl de, product_tbl p where res.user_id = u.user_id and res.res_detail_code = de.res_detail_code and de.product_code = p.product_code and u.user_code = #{user_code} order by res.res_detail_code desc
select r.*, u.user_id from review_tbl r, user_tbl u where r.user_code = u.user_code AND review_code = #{review_code}
mapper.update: update review_tbl set readCnt = #{readcnt} where review_code = #{review_code}
